text: Dylan Thomas Sprouse (born August 4, 1992) is an American actor and businessman. He is the twin brother of Cole Sprouse. He is known for his role as Zack Martin on the Disney Channel series The Suite Life of Zack & Cody and its spin-off, The Suite Life on Deck. He is also the co-founder of a New York brewery called All-Wise Meadery. ==References== Category:1992 births Category:Living people Category:American child actors Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American voice actors Category:Twin people from the United States Category:Actors from Long Beach, California Category:Businesspeople from California Category:Actors from New York City Category:Businesspeople from New York City
title: Dylan Sprouse
